summary: An ordinance relating to the elimination and prevention of fire and explosion hazards, and for such purposes regulating the construction, maintenance, equipment and use of structures, the use of premises and things, the conduct of persons, defining the powers and duties of certain officials and employees of the City of Seattle, providing for the issuance, suspension and revocation of certain permits, certificates of fitness and of approval, declaring certain acts and things to be nuisances, and providing for the abatement thereof; defing offenses, providing penalties and repealing Ordinances Nos. 36299 and 35048, and all amendments thereof.
